title: Understanding Manic Elation
text: Manic elation is a symptom often associated with bipolar disorder. It involves an elevated mood that can significantly impact daily functioning.

title: Characteristics of Manic Elation
text: During a manic episode, individuals may experience heightened energy levels, reduced need for sleep, and impulsive behavior.

hintAnswer: intense level of elation that can impair one’s ability to function normally and may necessitate hospitalization to ensure the safety of the individual and others
title: Identifying the Correct Description
text: Which of the following best describes manic elation?
choices: increased $$self-awareness$$, improved coping skills, better $$decision-making$$, improved relationships, and reduced risk of relapse
the feeling of being connected to and valued by others
intense level of elation that can impair one’s ability to function normally and may necessitate hospitalization to ensure the safety of the individual and others
limited or inconsistent access to the amount of food required to live a healthy lifestyle
a type of $$small-scale$$ living facility that, in addition to housing, provides support, supervision, and other types of assistance
